title: Blissful Region
verses: How sweet to reflect on those joys that await me, In yon blissful region, the haven of rest, And
I'll bathe in the ocean of pleasure unbounded, And range with delight through the Eden of love.
Encircled in light, and with glory enshrouded, My happiness perfect my mind's sky unclouded.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Anticipates the joys and bliss of the heavenly region and Eden of love
